adverbs.description: unintentionally (comparative more unintentionally, superlative most unintentionally)

entries.meaning: In an unintentional manner; not intentionally.
examples: "Oh, no! Mason will not defy me; nor knowing it, will he hurt me—but, unintentionally, he might in a moment, by one careless word, deprive me, if not of life, yet for ever of happiness."
